name: Siege Settlements v0.0_06 Pre-Alpha
description:
A top-down, stylized strategy game in a somewhat medieval setting.

Your task is to lead your faction and defeat the enemies. You will need to mine resources, construct buildings, train units, and research technologies in order to do that.

The game is very customizable and supports custom user-made maps.

Controls

W/A/S/D - Move Camera
Q/E - Rotate Camera or Build Preview
Mouse Wheel - Zoom Camera
Numpad5 - Reset Camera
LMB - Select
RMB - Assign task
L - Repair building (mouse over)
K - Resource payment speedup
O - Dropoff resources to existing Resource Deposit
P - Dropoff resources to new Resource Deposit

TAB - Toggle object HUD

1 - Set faction Id to 0
2 - Set faction Id to 1
8 - Spawn Resource Deposit "resource.pine"
9 - Spawn Resource Deposit "resource.wood"
0 - Spawn Resource Deposit "resource.stone"
